query: 查詢料號 10-0001 的品名和規格
sql:
SELECT
    t1.ima02,
    t1.ima021
FROM
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/ima_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t1
WHERE
    t1.ima01 = '10-0001'

ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 列出所有料件
sql:
SELECT t1.ima01, t1.ima02, t1.ima021, t1.ima08, t1.ima25
FROM read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/ima_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t1

ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 有多少種料件
sql:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ima01) FROM read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/ima_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t1 
ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 查詢所有料件的品名
sql:
SELECT t1.ima02 FROM read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/ima_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t1 
ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 料號 10-0001 是什麼
sql:
SELECT t1.ima02
FROM read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/ima_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t1
WHERE t1.ima01 = '10-0001'

ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 查詢料號開頭為 10- 的成品
sql:
SELECT t1.ima01, t1.ima02
FROM read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/ima_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t1
JOIN read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/img_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t2 ON t1.ima01 = t2.img01
WHERE t1.ima01 LIKE '10-%' AND t2.img02 = 'W01'

ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 查詢所有原料
sql:
SELECT t1.ima01, t1.ima02 FROM read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/ima_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t1 WHERE t1.ima08 = '原料' 
ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 查詢庫存單位為 PCS 的料號
sql:
SELECT t1.ima01
FROM read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/ima_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t1
WHERE t1.ima25 = 'PCS'

ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 查詢料號 RM01-001 的資訊
sql:
SELECT
    t1.ima01,
    t1.ima02,
    t1.ima021,
    t1.ima08,
    t1.ima25,
    SUM(t2.img10) AS img10_sum,
    MAX(t3.prc02) AS max_prc02
FROM
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/ima_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet') t1
LEFT JOIN
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/img_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet') t2 ON t1.ima01 = t2.img01 AND t2.img02 = 'W01'
LEFT JOIN
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/prc_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet') t3 ON t1.ima01 = t3.prc01
WHERE
    t1.ima01 = 'RM01-001'
GROUP BY
    t1.ima01,
    t1.ima02,
    t1.ima021,
    t1.ima08,
    t1.ima25

ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 按來源碼統計料件數量
sql:
SELECT
    t1.ima08,
    COUNT(*) AS quantity
FROM
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/ima_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t1
GROUP BY
    t1.ima08

ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 查詢 W01 倉庫的庫存
sql:
SELECT t1.img01, t1.img10
FROM read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/img_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t1
JOIN read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/imd_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t2 ON t1.img02 = t2.imd01
WHERE t2.imd02 = '成品倉'

ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 計算各倉庫的總庫存量
sql:
SELECT
    t3.imd01,
    SUM(t2.img10) AS total_inventory
FROM
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/imd_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t3
LEFT JOIN
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/img_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t2 ON t3.imd01 = t2.img02
GROUP BY
    t3.imd01

ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 查詢料號 10-0001 的庫存信息
sql:
SELECT
    t1.img01,
    t1.img02,
    t1.img03,
    t1.img10
FROM
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/img_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t1
JOIN
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/ima_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t2 ON t1.img01 = t2.ima01
WHERE
    t2.ima01 = '10-0001'

ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 列出所有負庫存的物料
sql:
SELECT
    t1.ima01,
    t1.ima02,
    SUM(t2.img10) AS stock
FROM
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/ima_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet') t1
JOIN
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/img_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet') t2 ON t1.ima01 = t2.img01
GROUP BY
    t1.ima01,
    t1.ima02
HAVING
    SUM(t2.img10) < 0

ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 列出前 10 個庫存量最多的物料
sql:
SELECT
    ima_file.ima01,
    ima_file.ima02,
    SUM(img_file.img10) AS total_quantity
FROM
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/ima_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) ima_file
JOIN
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/img_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) img_file ON ima_file.ima01 = img_file.img01
GROUP BY
    ima_file.ima01,
    ima_file.ima02
ORDER BY
    total_quantity DESC
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 統計 W03 成品倉的總庫存量
sql:
SELECT SUM(t2.img10) AS total_inventory
FROM read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/img_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t2
JOIN read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/imd_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t3 ON t2.img02 = t3.imd01
WHERE t3.imd02 = '成品倉'

ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 計算各倉庫的平均庫存量
sql:
SELECT
    t3.imd02,
    AVG(t2.img10) AS average_inventory
FROM
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/img_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t2
JOIN
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/imd_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet') t3 ON t2.img02 = t3.imd01
GROUP BY
    t3.imd02

ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 查詢庫存為 0 的料號
sql:
SELECT
    t1.img01,
    t3.ima02,
    t3.ima021,
    t3.ima25
FROM
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/img_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet') t1
JOIN
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/inventory/year=*/month=*/data.parquet') t2 ON t1.img01 = t2.item_code AND t1.img02 = t2.warehouse
LEFT JOIN
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/item_master/year=*/month=*/data.parquet') t3 ON t1.img01 = t3.item_code
WHERE
    t2.quantity = 0

ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0
error: 目前無交易明細資料

query: 原料倉存貨總額

FROM read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/img_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t2
JOIN read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/imd_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t3 ON t2.img02 = t3.imd01
WHERE t3.imd02 = '原料倉'

ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 各倉庫庫存數量統計
sql:
SELECT
    t3.imd01,
    SUM(t2.img10) AS total_quantity
FROM
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/imd_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t3
JOIN
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/img_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t2 ON t3.imd01 = t2.img02

query: 查詢料號 RM01-003 的庫存

    t1.img01,
    t1.img10
FROM
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/img_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t1

query: 庫存量最高的 5 個物料
sql:
SELECT
    t1.img01,
    SUM(t1.img10) AS total_quantity
FROM
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/img_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t1

query: 找出庫存最少的 10 個料號
sql:
SELECT
    t1.img01,
    SUM(t1.img10) AS total_quantity
FROM
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/img_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t1
GROUP BY
    t1.img01
ORDER BY
    total_quantity ASC
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 查詢所有採購進貨交易
sql:
SELECT
    t1.pmm01 AS PO_number,
    t1.pmm02 AS Purchase_date,
    t1.pmm04 AS Supplier_code,
    t3.pmc03 AS Supplier_name,
    t2.pmn04 AS Item_code,
    t2.pmn20 AS Quantity
FROM
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/pmm_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet') t1
JOIN
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/pmn_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet') t2 ON t1.pmm01 = t2.pmn01
LEFT JOIN
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/pmc_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet') t3 ON t1.pmm04 = t3.pmc01

ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 查詢 W04 倉庫的進貨記錄
sql:
SELECT t1.tlf06 AS 日期, t1.tlf05 AS 料號, t1.tlf10 AS 數量, t2.ima02 AS 品名
FROM read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/tlf_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t1
JOIN read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/ima_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t2 ON t1.tlf05 = t2.ima01
WHERE t1.tlf061 = 'W04' AND t1.tlf19 IN ('入庫', '調整') 
ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

                                                                        ^

ORDER BY 1

query: 最近 30 天的進貨
sql:
SELECT
    t1.tlf01,
    t1.tlf06,
    t1.tlf10,
    t5.ima02,
    t5.ima021,
    t5.ima25,
    t4.pmm02,
    t4.pmm04
FROM
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/tlf_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t1
JOIN
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/rvb_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet') t2 ON t1.tlf01 = t2.rvb05
JOIN
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/pmm_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet') t4 ON t2.rvb07 = t4.pmm01
JOIN
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/ima_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet') t5 ON t1.tlf01 = t5.ima01
WHERE
    t1.tlf06 >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY)
GROUP BY
    t1.tlf01,
    t1.tlf06,
    t1.tlf10,
    t5.ima02,
    t5.ima021,
    t5.ima25,
    t4.pmm02,
    t4.pmm04

ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 查詢所有銷貨記錄
sql:
SELECT
    tlf_file.tlf01 AS 料號,
    tlf_file.tlf06 AS 單據日期,
    tlf_file.tlf10 AS 異動數量,
    tlf_file.tlf13 AS 來源單號,
    tlf_file.tlf19 AS 交易類型,
    tlf_file.tlf061 AS 倉庫代號
FROM read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/tlf_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) tlf_file
WHERE tlf_file.tlf19 = '銷貨'

ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 2024 年銷售出庫筆數
sql:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/tlf_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t1 JOIN read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/img_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t2 ON t1.tlf01 = t2.img01 WHERE t1.tlf19 = '出庫' AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM t1.tlf06) = 2024 
ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 查詢完工入庫記錄
sql:
SELECT
    tlf_file.tlf01 AS 料號,
    tlf_file.tlf06 AS 單據日期,
    tlf_file.tlf10 AS 異動數量,
    tlf_file.tlf13 AS 來源單號,
    tlf_file.tlf19 AS 交易類型,
    tlf_file.tlf061 AS 倉庫代號
FROM read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/tlf_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) tlf_file
WHERE tlf_file.tlf19 = '完工入庫'

ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 查詢生產領料記錄
sql:
SELECT
    t1.imd01,
    t2.img03,
    t2.img10,
    t3.ima02,
    t4.pmc03
FROM
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/imd_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet') t1
JOIN
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/img_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet') t2 ON t1.imd01 = t2.img02
JOIN
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/ima_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet') t3 ON t2.img01 = t3.ima01
JOIN
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/pmm_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet') t4 ON t1.imd05 = t4.pmm01
JOIN
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/pmc_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet') t5 ON t4.pmm04 = t5.pmc01
WHERE
    t1.imd02 = '成品倉'

ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 查詢庫存報廢記錄
sql:
SELECT
    t1.img01,
    t1.img03,
    t1.img10,
    t5.imd02,
    t6.ima02,
    t7.pmc03
FROM
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/img_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t1
JOIN
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/inventory/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t2 ON t1.img01 = t2.item_code AND t1.img02 = t2.warehouse
JOIN
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/ima_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t6 ON t1.img01 = t6.ima01
LEFT JOIN
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/imd_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t5 ON t2.warehouse = t5.imd01
LEFT JOIN
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/pmn_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t7 ON t6.ima08 = t7.pmn04 AND t2.status = '報廢'
WHERE
    t2.status IN ('報廢')

ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 按交易類型統計數量
sql:
SELECT
    tlf_file.tlf19,
    COUNT(*) AS quantity
FROM
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/tlf_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) tlf_file
GROUP BY
    tlf_file.tlf19

ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 查詢料號 10-0001 的所有交易
sql:
SELECT
    t1.tlf01,
    t1.tlf06 AS '單據日期',
    t1.tlf10 AS '異動數量',
    t1.tlf13 AS '來源單號',
    t1.tlf19 AS '交易類型'
FROM
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/tlf_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t1
WHERE
    t1.tlf01 = '10-0001'

ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 查詢某來源單號的交易
sql:
SELECT tlf_file.tlf01 AS 料號, tlf_file.tlf06 AS 單據日期, tlf_file.tlf10 AS 異動數量, tlf_file.tlf13 AS 來源單號, tlf_file.tlf19 AS 交易類型, tlf_file.tlf061 AS 倉庫代號
FROM read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/tlf_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) tlf_file
WHERE tlf_file.tlf13 = '您的來源單號'

ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 查詢某倉庫的交易趨勢
sql:
SELECT
    t5.imd06,
    SUM(t3.tlf10) AS transaction_quantity
FROM
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/imd_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t5
JOIN
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/tlf_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t3 ON t5.imd01 = t3.tlf061
JOIN
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/img_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t2 ON t5.imd02 = t2.img02
WHERE
    t2.img01 = 'W01'
GROUP BY
    t5.imd06
ORDER BY
    t5.imd06
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 查詢所有訂單
sql:
SELECT
    t1.pmm01,
    t1.pmm02,
    t2.imd01,
    t2.imd02,
    SUM(t3.img10) AS total_quantity
FROM
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/pmm_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet') t1
JOIN
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/imd_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet') t2 ON t1.pmm04 = t2.imd01
LEFT JOIN
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/img_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet') t3 ON t1.pmm01 = t3.img01 AND t2.imd01 = t3.img02
GROUP BY
    t1.pmm01,
    t1.pmm02,
    t2.imd01,
    t2.imd02

ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 按月份統計訂單數量
sql:
SELECT
    t1.imd01,
    COUNT(*) AS order_count
FROM
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/imd_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t1
GROUP BY
    t1.imd01

ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 查詢訂單 SO-2024010001 的明細
sql:
SELECT
    tlf_file.tlf01 AS 料號,
    tlf_file.tlf06 AS 單據日期,
    tlf_file.tlf10 AS 異動數量,
    tlf_file.tlf13 AS 來源單號,
    tlf_file.tlf19 AS 交易類型,
    tlf_file.tlf061 AS 倉庫代號
FROM read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/tlf_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) tlf_file
WHERE tlf_file.tlf13 = 'SO-2024010001'

ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 查詢訂單 SO-2024010001 的總金額
sql:
SELECT SUM(t2.tlf10 * t3.img15) AS total_amount
FROM read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/tlf_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet') t1
JOIN read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/tll_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet') t2 ON t1.tlf01 = t2.tll01
JOIN read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/img_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet') t3 ON t2.tll04 = t3.img01
WHERE t1.tlf13 = 'SO-2024010001'

ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 查詢料號 10-0001 的訂購數量
sql:
SELECT SUM(t6.tlf10) AS 訂購數量
FROM read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/tlf_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t6
JOIN read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/ima_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t7 ON t6.tlf01 = t7.ima01
WHERE t7.ima01 = '10-0001' AND t6.tlf19 = '訂購'

ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 查詢已出貨數量
sql:
SELECT SUM(tlf_file.tlf10) as out_shipped_quantity
FROM read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/tlf_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) tlf_file
WHERE tlf_file.tlf19 = '出貨'

ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 按客户統計訂單金額
sql:
SELECT
    pmn_file.pmn03 AS customer_name,
    SUM(pmm_file.pmm05) AS total_order_amount
FROM
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/pmn_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet') t1
JOIN
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/pmm_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet') t2 ON t1.pmn01 = t2.pmm04
GROUP BY
    pmn_file.pmn03

ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 查詢部分出貨的訂單
sql:
SELECT t1.tlf01, t1.tlf06, SUM(t1.tlf10) AS total_quantity
FROM read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/tlf_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t1
JOIN read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/tlo_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t2 ON t1.tlf04 = t2.tlo01
WHERE t2.tlo06 = '部分出貨'
GROUP BY t1.tlf01, t1.tlf06

ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0
error: 目前無交易明細資料

query: 查詢業務人員的訂單
sql:
SELECT
    t5.imd01,
    t6.pmm01,
    t7.pmc03,
    SUM(t2.img10) AS total_quantity
FROM
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/ima_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet') t1
JOIN
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/img_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet') t2 ON t1.ima01 = t2.img01
JOIN
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/imd_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet') t5 ON t2.img02 = t5.imd01
JOIN
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/pmm_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet') t6 ON t5.imd04 = t6.pmm01
JOIN
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/pmc_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet') t7 ON t6.pmm04 = t7.pmc01
WHERE
    t5.imd02 = '業務人員的訂單'
GROUP BY
    t5.imd01,
    t6.pmm01,
    t7.pmc03

ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 查詢料號 10-0001 的單價
sql:
SELECT t1.prc02 FROM read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/prc_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t1 WHERE t1.prc01 = '10-0001' 
ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 料號 10-0001 的最新報價
sql:
SELECT
    prc_file.prc01,
    MAX(prc_file.prc03) AS latest_price_date,
    MAX(prc_file.prc02) AS latest_price
FROM
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/prc_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) prc_file
JOIN
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/ima_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) ima_file ON prc_file.prc01 = ima_file.ima01
WHERE
    ima_file.ima01 = '10-0001'
GROUP BY
    prc_file.prc01

ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 所有料件的價格列表
sql:
SELECT
    t1.prc01 AS 料號,
    t1.prc02 AS 單僅,
    t1.prc03 AS 批准日期,
    t1.prc04 AS 批准狀態,
    t1.prc05 AS 生效日,
    t1.prc06 AS 失效日
FROM read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/prc_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet') t1

ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 查詢料號 10-0001 的歷史價格
sql:
SELECT
    t6.prc01,
    t6.prc03,
    t6.prc04,
    t6.prc05,
    t6.prc06
FROM
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/prc_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet') t6
JOIN
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/ima_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet') t1 ON t6.prc01 = t1.ima01
WHERE
    t1.ima01 = '10-0001'
ORDER BY
    t6.prc05 DESC,
    t6.prc03 ASC
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 計算料號的平均價格
sql:
SELECT
    t1.prc01,
    AVG(t1.prc02) AS average_price
FROM
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/prc_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t1
JOIN
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/ima_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet', hive_partitioning=true) t2 ON t1.prc01 = t2.ima01
GROUP BY
    t1.prc01

ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

query: 查詢有效期內的價格
sql:
SELECT
    t1.prc01,
    t1.prc02,
    t1.prc05,
    t1.prc06
FROM
    read_parquet('s3://tiptop-raw/raw/v1/prc_file/year=*/month=*/data.parquet') t1
WHERE
    CURRENT_DATE BETWEEN t1.prc05 AND t1.prc06

ORDER BY 1
LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0
